posts.postText: I think we should add some new sounds. Just for fun. And maybe replace the pwnedftw.mp3. Its getting old. I could cut some sound clips or something. I just thought it'd be cool.

Traitors Win 
=We are the Champions - Queen "No Time for losers, cause we are the Champions... Of the World!!!"
=Smooth Criminal - MJ "You got hit by, You got struck by, OW!! A Smooth Criminal!!!"
=Getting away with Murder - Papa Roach "I feel Irrational! So confrontational! To Tell the the Truth I am Getting away with Murder!"
=Ready to Die - Andrew W.K. - You better get ready Die, You Better get ready to kill, you better get ready to run cause here we come! you better get ready to DIE!!!!!
=Bad Name - Bon Jovi - Shot through the HEart!!! and your too late, darling you give love, a Bad Name *Guitar Riff*
Innocents win
=Still Alive - Portal - " I feel fantastic an I'm Still Alive, and Im still Alive, While your dying ill be still alive, and when your dead ill be still alive, Still Alive, still alive..."
=Blow me Away - BB - "Only the strongest will survive! Lead me to heaven where we'll reside! I have the shadow on the wall, I'll Be the One to save us ALLLLLL!"
some ideas
Gash can't be bothered to add anything. >_>

Traitors win-
Crack a bottle - Eminem
You shook me all night long - ACDC
Highway to hell - ACDC
Hells bells - ACDC
Thunderstruck (refrain only) - ACDC
Sabotage - Beastie boys
Leeroy jenkins remix

Innos win-
Till I collapse - Eminem
Back in Black - ACDC
You could be mine - Guns n roses
Vodka - Korpiklaani
Over my head - Sum 41
All the small things - Blink 182
You're a jerk - new boyz

I like that eminem stuff. 

To be honest, the only sound I would enjoy would be about a 10 second sound clip from the youtube video "DOOR STUCK!" when he says 

"DOOR STUCK! DOOR STUCK!"
I could try and add around 5 songs for each win for teams, then have it in random order.
